plot: A funeral, a Chinese opera about filial piety, and a strange encounter with a dead man's family lead Xie Ping to consider an alternative lifestyle to his city work as an insurance agent.
title: Under the Sun in the Town
plot_es: A funeral, a Chinese opera about filial piety, and a strange encounter with a dead man's family lead Xie Ping to consider an alternative lifestyle to his city work as an insurance agent.
original_name: Under the Sun in the Town
plot_en: A funeral, a Chinese opera about filial piety, and a strange encounter with a dead man's family lead Xie Ping to consider an alternative lifestyle to his city work as an insurance agent.
